name: Teeth Brushing Simulator
detailed_description:
Teeth brushing simulator

A local game oligarch rolled out another project: the Teeth Brushing Simulator.
Original gameplay, a unique experience. First in the world.
Do your parents force you to brush your teeth and you don’t want to lie to them?
No problem. Brush your teeth in the virtual world, technically it’s considered.
Coupled with Toilet Simulator, there is no need to climb out of the computer anymore.

Attention. Playing with a secret. There are elements of horror.

Are you afraid to brush your teeth in real life, is there a certain threshold through which you cannot cross? With this game you can simulate a situation and it is possible to understand that there is nothing terrible in it, get used to a toothpick. There are no guarantees, of course, that this will help, but why not try?
What are you, weakly what? Scared, yes?

Teach yourself discipline [/ b]

This game is an excellent trainer for discipline.
Turn on this game 3 times a day, every time after eating, and you may see your willpower increase, and you can already brush your teeth in reality.
Suppose you do not have a toothbrush and you need to do some action to develop discipline. This game is your salvation. Just turn it on 2-3 times a day, at the same time, and brush your teeth for 2 minutes. And you can 5. Yes, yes, you heard right. Can!


Hone your brushing skills[/ b]
Everyone knows that in order to shoot better you need to play shooters. And in order to better brush your teeth, play tuff bracers.
Dreamed of becoming a professional eSports or get a professional toothpick? Are you dreaming to make a jiggle of an oligarch?
Welcome
This game is the first step to your dream.


Specifications

- first person game
- The mechanics of cleaning teeth
- good graphics
- the character has a body
- Teeth cleaning fully animated
- You can rotate the camera and walk
- elements of horror
- Screamers
- Hardbass Ost
- Camera mode from a third party
- secret

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

highlighted.name: I brushed my teeth for 2 minutes
